movenet 0.2.0-1

    Pseudonymising livestock movement and holding data Network analysis of livestock movement data Integrating livestock movement data into transmission models Configurations

    Function reference

    Loading and reformatting of data files

    Functions for loading and initial processing of data files

    load_config()
    Load configurations from a config file into the movenet environment
    reformat_data()
    Read in livestock movement or holding data, and reshape to movenet format
    asciify()
    Convert character strings to unique, ASCII-compliant, and syntactically valid column names

    Pseudonymising movement or holding data

    Functions for making data non-identifiable

    anonymise()
    Anonymise data by replacing holding identifiers with prefix-integer combinations
    jitter_dates()
    Jitter (add noise to) movement dates
    jitter_weights()
    Jitter (add noise to) numeric movement data
    round_dates()
    Round down movement dates, and/or summarise data by time unit
    round_weights()
    Round numeric movement data

    Network analysis of movement data

    Functions for generating network representations of movement data and performing network analyses

    movedata2networkDynamic()
    Create a dynamic network representation of movenet-format movement data
    create_temporal_network_analysis_report()
    Create a temporal network analysis report from a movement network
    parallel_summarise_temporal_node_properties()
    Extract summary stats for temporal network node properties, in parallel

    Integration of movement data into disease models

    Functions for integrating movement and holding data into disease models

    data2contactmatrix()
    Create transmission probability matrix for SEIRcm model from movement and holding data
    SEIRcm()
    Create an SEIR model with contact matrix (from siminf4movenet)
    SEIRcm_ASF()
    Create an SEIR model with contact matrix and ASF-inspired parameters
    create_random_infected_vector()
    Create a vector of holdings infected at t=0 to plug into SimInf models, by randomly selecting a specified number of holdings
    create_specified_infected_vector()
    Create a vector of holdings infected at t=0 to plug into SimInf models, using holding identifiers
    get_cumulative_infected()
    Get the cumulative infected (I+R components) from SimInf model trajectories

    Configurations

    Functions for setting and changing movenet configurations

    load_config()
    Load configurations from a config file into the movenet environment
    validate_config()
    Validate a movenet config file
    get_config()
    Get the values of configurations currently set in the movenet environment
    change_config()
    Change individual configurations in the movenet environment
    save_config()
    Save current configurations to a config file
    new_config()
    Copy a config file template to your working directory

    Example data

    Example data files and structures included in movenet

    example_movement_data.csv
    Example movement data file (delimited text)
    example_movement_data
    Example movenet-format movement data
    example_holding_data.csv
    Example holding data file (delimited text)
    example_holding_data
    Example movenet-format holding data
    local_spread_probabilities_ASF
    ASF local spread transmission probabilities
